content.rendered:
Complete automation systems

Proserv is an integrated service provider of complete automation systems for producing oil and gas fields and pipelines. Our solutions include remote terminal units (RTUs), programmable logic controllers (PLCs) and downhole gauges at the field site; radio, cellular, and satellite communication systems; SCADA, artificial lift analysis, operations management and well-file software.

Production SCADA systems

Our telemetry and supervisory control and data acquisition (SCADA) systems provide clients with the capability to monitor and control field operations across a widely dispersed infrastructure helping to improve the efficiency of remote operations and assets.

 

Configurations and options include both multiple systems and stand alone units, using solar power or other alternative energy sources. Proserv’s implementation skills include project management, systems integration, PLC programming, RTU configuration, and installation and testing.

Proserv has manufactured and installed RTUs for the following applications:

Facilities
Wellhead
Water injection
Gas lift
Advanced water treatment (AWT)
Electric submersible pump (ESP) systems including serial interface
Net oil computer (NOC)
Data logger

Make an

Enquiry

Single point

mooring buoys

Proserv offers integrated control and monitoring solutions for catenary anchor leg mooring (CALM) buoys. These provide the mooring point and oil loading mechanism for crude oil supertankers. The systems we supply allow for remote control and monitoring of the buoy instrumentation and navigation aids.

Buoy control systems
